Info.Description:
Variable Price Changes
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] All items in the shop (buyavle or sellable) can have their prices changed. [/list]
[size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][b]JRavens[/b][/size] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Ported to the MI format by: [/color][b]LinkHero95.[/b][/size]
